These videos are not financial advice. They are purely for entertainment purposes.

Hi, my name is Viks! If you're interested in how to earn more money, how to manage debt, how to make more passive income, investing and other personal finance topics, subscribe to the channel. I conduct extensive research for the production of each video which is then compiled into a written script. The narration is then done by me personally.
